column2: Oh, hello there. Riley said you have some questions.

So, Faber, about that stealth device you mentioned. Just as an experiment, how about if we make one?

Not that we'd ever use it for real or anything!

Oh, yeah, the stealth device. Hmmm. These are very tricky, but I have studied them quite extensively. 

Pretty sure I can make one for you. For expermentation only! 

Riley, my friend, promise me, you're not going get in any kind of trouble with it, are you?
Trouble? Us? Faber, you know I never get into trouble ;)

OK, just making sure. I'll have to get my hands on a few necessary components.

I'm going to need you two to get me a click spring, a hush gasket, and a ratchet wheel the size of a penny. 

Oh, right, and some soap bubbles and a small quantity of cloaking glaze. Think you can find those things?
Sure. We're on it. Thanks, Faber!
